reviews.review: This movie is a must see, but people should have some backround knowledge. This movie is better than black panther. Also rotten tomatos are not trust worthy.
good acting great story and the action is nonstop the end is very dark and some don't make it out alive

Gran película de acción. De lo mejorcito que se ha hecho de superheroes. Se hace corta a pesar de no serlo. Tiene acción a raudales, grandes efectos especiales, buena banda sonora, buenas dosis de humor, una historia que hila perfectamente con todas las películas hechas hasta la fecha y que maneja de manera magistral la aparición de tantísimos grandes personajes, y un enemigo a batir formidable. Además, hay lugar para muchas sorpresas. Me lo he pasado cual niño pequeño viéndola. No puedo esperar a ver la segunda parte

First off, this movie isn't for everyone. This is a movie made for fans. It needed to be a fun movie, and yet it had to deliver on the most colossal multi-movie arcs of all time. It did all of those things. There are some clashing tones and some under developed characters, but I don't see how it could have been any other way. You HAVE to be invested in some of these characters through their development in their other movies, and you HAVE to appreciate their unique tones which were adapted to portray them in their stand-alone movies. For comparison, it is like Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows multiplied across different story arcs and different sagas in 19 other movies with separate themes. Or if soap operas ever had a multi-million dollar budget, and A-list actors, and they had to deliver on something akin to to a series finale. You can't just pop in and hope to truly appreciate this film if you don't already know and love these characters. That said, they still managed to build great character arcs unique to this film while also tying into larger story arcs across all of their movies (for a few characters at least). This was a monumental accomplishment of film, and while I do worry about the impact of Disney and the superhero genre on cinema, it is impossible for me not to be in awe of this monolithic level of storytelling. More could have been done, possibly, to have a more consistent tone and theme, which is why I'm rating this movie 4.5 stars. However, it almost doesn't seem fair considering what they accomplished in this culmination of the most ambitious cinematic undertaking in history. So for the majority who only somewhat enjoy superhero movies, this is a 3 or 3.5 star movie, but for the Marvel Cinematic Universe fans this is a 5 star movie and will remain an absolute A+ epic for the rest of your life.

Definitely not for non-Comic movie fans, but for those that love silly action movies this was fantastic! No need to waste time introducing characters and straight to the plot and action of this movie. Phenomenal movie and the best Marvel villain yet.
Very good!  Really kept true to the comics with the power of Thanos and the stone.  Amazing acting of course, hyped for the next one!  10/10
No words are good enough for this piece.

EPIC!!! It's the only word that can properly define this colossal movie. It's stunning, tragic, comedy, dynamic, serious, sad, great dialogues, awesome visual scenes, great sounds, it's simply ONE OF A KIND. Really. it's something bigger than a cinecomic, which elevates this great genre to another level. Love this huge cast, the Russos & screenwriters.. And All Hail To King Feige! PERFECT
This movie shattered all my expectations. As a person who is regularly let down by super hero movies, this movie blew me away.
Easily the best comic movie ever but I would go as far as to say best action movie ever. The plot was amazing. Can’t wait for the next one
